Get a paginated list of OIDC clients with optional search and sorting

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"description":"Search term to filter clients by name","in":"query","name":"search","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Page number, starting from 1","in":"query","name":"page","schema":{"type":"integer","default":1}},{"description":"Number of items per page","in":"query","name":"limit","schema":{"type":"integer","default":10}},{"description":"Column to sort by","in":"query","name":"sort_column","schema":{"type":"string","default":"\"name\""}},{"description":"Sort direction (asc or desc)","in":"query","name":"sort_direction","schema":{"type":"string","default":"\"asc\""}}]}
